title: Injunctive relief
context: [ยง328-118] Injunctive relief. The director may institute a civil action in any court of competent jurisdiction for injunctive relief to prevent any violation of this part or any rule adopted under this part. The court shall have powers to grant relief in accordance with the Hawaii rules of civil procedure. [L 1992, c 196, pt of ยง2] Rules of Court Injunctions, see HRCP rule 65.
